content:
=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Mcap of 7 of top-10 most valued firms declines by Rs 35,439 cr; SBI biggest laggard
Source: Economic Times - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 06:13
Related Stocks: SBI
Categories: markets

Summary:
The combined market valuation of seven of the top-10 most valued firms declined by Rs 35,439.36 crore in a holiday-shortened last week, with State Bank of India taking the biggest hit, in line with a muted trend in equities.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/markets/stocks/news/mcap-of-7-of-top-10-most-valued-firms-declines-by-rs-35439-cr-sbi-biggest-laggard/articleshow/126212867.cms
metadata: {"title": "Mcap of 7 of top-10 most valued firms declines by Rs 35,439 cr; SBI biggest laggard", "sentiment": "neutral", "symbols": ["SBI"]}
